org.eclipse.eef.core.api.controllers

Interface IEEFController

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEEFButtonController, IEEFCheckboxController, IEEFGroupController, IEEFHyperlinkController, IEEFLabelController, IEEFListController, IEEFMultipleReferencesController, IEEFOnClickController, IEEFRadioController, IEEFSectionController, IEEFSelectController, IEEFTextController, IEEFWidgetController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEEFController, AbstractEEFCustomWidgetController, AbstractEEFOnClickController, AbstractEEFWidgetController, EEFButtonController, EEFCheckboxController, EEFGroupController, EEFHyperlinkController, EEFLabelController, EEFListController, EEFRadioController, EEFSectionController, EEFSelectController, EEFTextController

    public interface IEEFController
    Common interface of all the controllers.

    • Method Summary

      Registers a consumer which will be called with the validation status.
      void refresh()

      void removeValidationConsumer()
      Removes the consumer of the validation.
